div.p: At Belmont Charter Network, we prepare students for life by promoting the academic, social and emotional well-being of each individual.

div.h4: Want to become a part of the Belmont Charter Network Family?

div.h3: We believe every child has his or her own path. Our community schools support students and their families, inspiring children to realize their own unique potential.

div.h2: LEARN MORE ABOUT WHAT’S HAPPENING IN OUR SCHOOLS

div.p: Belmont Charter School's Out-of-School Time students wowed audiences with the Lion King Jr!
Belmont Charter Network students' celebrated Black History Month through creative showcases.

div.a: Belmont Charter Schools Continue to Shine on the 2017-2018 School Progress Reports

div.p: Recent reports from the School District of Philadelphia indicate that our schools continue to positively impact the students we support on a daily basis.
“My daughter enjoys getting up every day to go to school. Not only is the curriculum amazing, but the love and support the teachers and staff provide is truly a blessing.”
